# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $150 by us due to its high-quality materials, advanced features, and unique design. Considering its superior craftsmanship and functionality, I believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection. I kindly invite you to accept this offer at $140, making it a great opportunity for you to enjoy all its benefits without breaking the bank. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $140. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $140
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
